name: Coconut Tapioca Tortilla
description: This Coconut Tapioca Tortilla is a delightful blend of health and taste, perfect for those looking for low-sodium, low-sugar, and high-fiber options. Made with a unique combination of almond milk, tapioca flour, chia seeds, coconut flour, and eggs, this tortilla is a 'Healthyfied' twist on your typical recipes, aiming to enrich your diet without compromising on flavor.
recipeIngredient: 64 g Coconut Flour - 100% Natural Coconut Meat

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together almond milk, finely ground tapioca flour, organic chia seeds, coconut flour, and salt until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a separate bowl and beat them until fluffy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Gradually mix the beaten eggs into the dry ingredients, stirring constantly to ensure a smooth mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Let the batter rest for 10 minutes to allow the chia seeds to gel, thickening the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and pour a portion of the batter, spreading it thinly to form a tortilla shape. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown and fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
